User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the VínculoAgro application, with distinct roles determining access and functionality. Authentication details are managed by an external system.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

email.description: Email address of the user, primarily used as an identifier for authentication (handled externally).

role.description: The role of the user within the VínculoAgro application. 'Administrator' for the Secretaría (can upload and manage documents), 'Viewer' for all other users (can search, view, and summarize documents).

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the user account was last updated.

Document.title: Document
Document.description: Represents a document stored in the VínculoAgro repository, including its associated metadata and file location.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Document entity.

title.description: The official title of the document.

description.description: An optional brief description or abstract of the document's content.

fileUrl.description: The URL or path where the actual document file is stored.

fileType.description: The type of the document file (e.g., 'PDF', 'DOCX', 'JPG').

uploadDate.description: The date and time when the document was uploaded to the repository.

uploadedByUserId.description: Reference to the User who uploaded this document.

agreementTypeId.description: Reference to the type of agreement.

projectId.description: Reference to the project this document is associated with.

isVigente.description: Indica si el convenio está vigente.
